body:
Alright, If you're a person that doesn't know much about the release of the TITAN X or are not familiar with Graphics cards at all, please look at these before you start replying here:

GeForce GTX TITAN X Overview (LTT)
What Is a Graphics card?
Features of the TITAN X (NVIDIA Website)

Now that you are somewhat familiar with this, lets talk about it:
So I want to hear some opinions from you, 
1) In your opinion is it worth the Price?
2) If you had one, what would you do?
3) Has it changed much from the Titan Z?
4) Will NVIDIA Make profit out of it
5) If you had the money, would you buy it, or an SLI of 980's?
6) Is it worth $1000?
7) What do you feel about the new Design of it?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

For me personally, I don't really know why they bother to release the Titans, I mean they already have monster GPU's, such as 980's and what-not.

I got to give it some props tho, for having over 3000 Cuda cores, not too bad for $1k.
Even tho the Titan Z was overkill with 5000? Cuda cores, It was still around 1.5k...
(Idk where Im going with this)

Now the design of the Titan, isn't impressive... sure, the colors turned grayer, darker, blacker.. But honestly they need to change their stock cooler, its getting boring now...

If I were able to buy it, would I? Well NVIDIA saying that the X card is 'The fastest GPU', I wouldn't go that route, instead I would go with 2 SLI of 770 Classified, which deliver whopping 700+ fps on MC (Without recording, don't believe me look it up), And with recording (Fraps) drops to about 400-500, somewhere around there, Idk if the X would do that, but It probably can.

The Good old 4k Display, Ohh boys, having 12GB of VRAM is just overkill, even for 4k / 5K, not an expert with resolutions here, but Having 12GB is just why, in benchmarks it only exceeds around 6GB for 4k, exactly what a Titan Black can do.

Now I realize people will hate me for giving bad information, and stating my opinion, but whatever xD, I just want to know what you guys think, Yes, im bad. Bi
